feature.label: DataDictionary Memory Feature
feature.description:
This feature provides the data dictionary for Odysseus. This version of the datadictionary is not persisted (just in memory), so that e.g. all installed sources and sinks are not restored and there is a fresh system after each restart.
Note that there is also alternatively a filestore-based data dictionary that may not be installed simultaneously.
